comment._content:
Cy Falkenberg
Frederick Peter Falkenberg
Position: Pitcher 
Bats: Right, Throws: Right 
Height: 6' 5", Weight: 180 lb.
Born: December 17, 1879 in Chicago, IL 
School: University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign (All Transactions)
Debut: April 21, 1903 
Teams (by GP): Naps/Senators/Hoosiers/Pepper/Athletics/.. 1903-1917
Final Game: July 4, 1917 
Died: April 15, 1961 in San Francisco, CA 
Buried: Holy Cross Cemetery,in Colma, CA
